Class TankBot

java.lang.Object
dev.robocode.tankroyale.botapi.BaseBot
dev.robocode.tankroyale.botapi.Bot
infinite.mind.TankBot
All Implemented Interfaces:
dev.robocode.tankroyale.botapi.IBaseBot, dev.robocode.tankroyale.botapi.IBot
public class TankBot extends dev.robocode.tankroyale.botapi.Bot
Example bot demonstrating basic movement and target handling using the Tank Royale Bot API.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Entry point that launches the bot.
      Parameters:
      args - command line arguments (unused)

    • run

      public void run()
      Called when a new round is started. Initializes colors and repeatedly searches for opponents while patrolling the arena center.

    • onScannedBot

      public void onScannedBot(dev.robocode.tankroyale.botapi.events.ScannedBotEvent e)
      Fired when another bot is scanned. Updates targeting and fires based on distance and certainty.

    • onHitByBullet

      public void onHitByBullet(dev.robocode.tankroyale.botapi.events.HitByBulletEvent e)
      Called when the bot is hit by a bullet. Turns perpendicular to the incoming fire and moves ahead to evade further shots.
